Container.Name: mediabox-webdav
Container.Overview: This image runs an easily configurable WebDAV server with Apache.

Config.Name: USERNAME
Config.Description: Container Variable: USERNAME . Authenticate with this username (and the password below). This is ignored if you bind mount your own authentication file to /user.passwd

Config.Name: PASSWORD
Config.Description: Container Variable: PASSWORD . Authenticate with this password (and the username above). This is ignored if you bind mount your own authentication file to /user.passwd

Config.Name: AUTH_TYPE
Config.Description: Container Variable: AUTH_TYPE . Apache authentication type to use. This can be Basic (best choice for HTTPS) or Digest (best choice for HTTP). The default is Basic

Config.Name: LOCATION
Config.Description: Container Variable: LOCATION. The URL path for WebDAV (eg, if set to /webdav then clients should connect to example.com/webdav). The default is /
